channel.title: Help Getting My Server Off Hamachi?!
channel.description: Hey, Im Not To Good At Stuff Like This, Althought I Have Completed My Server, But My Mate's Have Trouble With Hamachi, I Was Wondering If Somebody Could Help Me Get My Server Online (off hamachi) If You Know How Could You Please Tell Me How Or Add My Msn, (Zoolig1@hotmail.com) Or Aim (Nubcake18), Help Me, You Know You Want Too ;) :cool:[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 07:18:11 AM[/size][hr]Anyone? :( please... :'(

item.description:
@Ricksta18 wrote:

its kuntscape.no-ip.info :), sorry for language lol but anyway it says: [Wed 21:58] Updating host: kuntscape.no-ip.info
[Wed 21:58] kuntscape.no-ip.info: DNS is current, no update needed.
and i tell my friend ip and it still dont work, i got duc and hamachi running thats all, i got server running and it wont let them connect man it says error connecting to server must be down, :S please help me foolz :)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 29, 2006, 05:43:27 AM[/size][hr]well?

item.title: Help Getting My Server Off Hamachi?!
item.dc:creator: @Ricksta18 Ricksta18
item.description:
@Ricksta18 wrote:

no, im able to play my server but no1 can connect to it , they have to connect trought hamachi and join my ip, and i want it so they can just type the ip and join without useing hamachi so they can just type SERVERNAME.NO-IP.INFO, instead of all numbers, anyone know what im talking about ? o.O lol[br][size=1]Posted at: November 28, 2006, 07:58:58 AM[/size][hr]does any1 know how to get my server off hamachi? i mean like i want it so people dont need to download hamachi to connect, they can just run moparscape and type in my i.p and play, cause this way no1 is ever on but i find my server quite good =)

Read full topic
